name: AR Drone Commander Lite
description: Fight off the Enemy in Augmented Reality Combat In your Living room. With this Augmented Reality App, bring the enemy into your home and then make him sorry he showed up! This is a wave-based defensive format with waves of enemy attacks that get progressively more difficult. Use the scaling function to play in an open indoor space, or scale up to max in an open outdoor area for maximum size and effect. Performance may suffer on older devices. This is a free version of the paid app named AR Drone Commander. Try this version and move up to the paid version to experience more that AR Drone Commander has to offer.
